text: Nocardioides albidus is a Gram-positive, aerobic and non-motile bacterium from the genus of Nocardioides which has been isolated from soil from Incheon in Korea. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Nocardioides albidus at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase albidus Category:Bacteria described in 2016
title: Nocardioides albidus
